translated: The Paṭṭhāna Treatise🔽The Paṭṭhāna Treatise in the Abhidhamma Piṭaka

The Chapter on the Contemplations, the Chapter on the Wholesome🔽With applied thought and sustained thought, a wholesome mind-object condition arises, not without applied thought and sustained thought, not wholesome. … Three.🔽With applied thought and sustained thought, a wholesome mind-object condition arises, not without applied thought and sustained thought, not wholesome. … Three.

original: Savitakkasavicāraṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasavitakkasavicāro nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.🔽Avitakkavicāramattaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naavitakkavicāramatto nakusalo dhammo🔽uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pannarasa, adhipatiyā pannarasa …pe… avigate pannarasa.
analyzed: sa vitakka sa vicāram kusalam dhammam paṭicca na sa vitakka sa vicāraḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi  a vitakka vicāra mattam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na a vitakka vicāra mattaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammo  uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā pannarasa adhipatiyā pannarasa pe avigate pannarasa

original: Savitakkasavicāraṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasavitakkasavicāro naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: sa vitakka sa vicāram akusalam dhammam paṭicca na sa vitakka sa vicāraḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava adhipatiyā nava pe avigate nava
